subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The good feelings surrounding the Giants evaporated in a 27-0 loss to the Eagles, a disheartening performance in which receiver Victor Cruz was most likely lost for the season with a knee injury.
snippet: The good feelings surrounding the Giants evaporated in a 27-0 loss to the Eagles, a disheartening performance in which receiver Victor Cruz was most likely lost for the season with a knee injury.
